entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:54 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Harrow AAFC 01:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle except drizzle near Lake Erie. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon and ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 01:10 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
